PHRASE.LANG: Wear this red top made famous by Scotty. Wear with the black trousers and boots for the full Starfleet uniform. [#Legal]

Ponte esta parte de arriba roja popularizada por Scotty. Ponte estos pantalones negros y estas botas para completar el uniforme de Starfleet. [#Legal]
